Service Details: - Delivers a three-course meal that includes one protein, two vegetables and a starch with a soup and dessert included- A salad is offered in place of a soup or a dessert if customer prefers- Operated by Interior Health's Food Services Department- Can accommodate low sodium, diabetic, gluten free, renal, minced, soft and pureed food diets; please call to discuss other special diet particulars- Note: *please see individual records for West Kelowna delivery times and the Dinners at Home program details*
Hours: Meal Delivery: Mon, Wed, Fri: 11:00am - 12:30pmOffice inquiries: Mon-Fri: 12:00pm - 2:30pm (closed weekends and statutory holidays)
Dates: - Customers ordering meals for Tue, Thur, Sat and Sun can do so through the Dinners at Home program- Usually delivered together with hot meals
Eligibility: - Seniors age 55 and up, those who are home bound, have a disability, and/or are unable to access nutritious meals- Those recovering from surgery may quality; please call to discuss your situation
Cost: * $7.50 per meal * DVA clients might qualify for the meal program *  if approved meals will be paid for * contact us and your service provider for additional details
Address & Map: May Bennett Wellness Center135 Davie RdKelowna, BC     V1X 1Y8
